title: Homework 4
text: Loading libraries tidyverse,readxl,dplyr: Echo=false, include=false (getting rid of annoying warnings)

title: Homework 4
text:
Glass Data

1

glass_data <- read_csv("https://www4.stat.ncsu.edu/~online/datasets/glass.data", col_names = FALSE) |>
  rename(
    IdNumber = X1,
    RI       = X2,
    Na       = X3,
    Mg       = X4,
    Al       = X5,
    Si       = X6,
    K        = X7,
    Ca       = X8,
    Ba       = X9,
    Fe       = X10,
    Type_of_Glass = X11
  )

Rows: 214 Columns: 11
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
dbl (11): X1, X2, X3, X4, X5, X6, X7, X8, X9, X10, X11

2

glass_data <- glass_data |>
  mutate(Type_of_Glass = ifelse(Type_of_Glass == 1, "building_windows_float_processed",
                ifelse(Type_of_Glass == 2, "building_windows_non_float_processed",
                ifelse(Type_of_Glass == 3, "vehicle_windows_float_processed",
                ifelse(Type_of_Glass == 4, "vehicle_windows_non_float_processed",
                ifelse(Type_of_Glass == 5, "containers",
                ifelse(Type_of_Glass == 6, "tableware",
                ifelse(Type_of_Glass == 7, "headlamps",NA))))))))

title: Homework 4
text:
Yeast Data

1

yeast_data <- "https://www4.stat.ncsu.edu/~online/datasets/yeast.data" |>
  read_table(col_names = c("seq_name", "mcg", "gvh", "alm", "mit", "erl", "pox", "vac", "nuc", "class"))


── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
cols(
  seq_name = col_character(),
  mcg = col_double(),
  gvh = col_double(),
  alm = col_double(),
  mit = col_double(),
  erl = col_double(),
  pox = col_double(),
  vac = col_double(),
  nuc = col_double(),
  class = col_character()
)

yeast_data

# A tibble: 1,484 × 10
   seq_name     mcg   gvh   alm   mit   erl   pox   vac   nuc class

2

yeast_data<-yeast_data |>
  select(-seq_name,-nuc)
colnames(yeast_data)

[1] "mcg"   "gvh"   "alm"   "mit"   "erl"   "pox"   "vac"   "class"




3

yeast_data |>
  group_by(class) |>
  mutate(
    across(where(is.numeric), 
           list(mean = mean, median = median)))
